column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Like the Met
column2: they have art from all over the world throughout history. The American and European sections appeared to be the largest
column3: with a lot of paintings. However
column4: there are still sections dedicated to Asian art
column8: ancient Greek and more. We spotted a few famous pieces too
column9: like "American Gothic" and "Nighthawks". This place is definitely a must see for art lovers in Chicago.
